law.catch_line: Within 5 days after the change, a licensee shall submit to the Board written notice of:...
law.text:
Within 5 days after the change, a licensee shall submit to the Board written notice of:
If the licensee is an individual or entity, any change in the address or telephone number of an existing office or principal place of business; and
If the licensee is an entity, the addition of a branch office.
